data.message:
Shady.
Please don't forget us,don't forget the Belgian People.
We love you so much.

Im a fan yeah that's true,I know so Much songs from slim shady  (like anywone human on this earht.)

But stay like you are because People need a man like you.

Im 28 and i grow up with your's song's so continues because you are the Best men.

This is my first and my Last message but my love for you're talent will stay always the same.
